forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
In the soft embrace of a mostly cloudy night, downtown San Francisco finds itself cloaked in a serene calm, with temperatures lingering around a pleasant fifty degrees. The wind, barely a whisper, drifts gently from the west-southwest, barely ruffling the air or the thoughts of evening strollers below. As dawn approaches, it promises a continuation of this cloud-draped dawn, where the sun will peek through, warming the city to a mild sixty-three. Yet, as the day unfolds, expect the temperatures to dip slightly, leaning towards the cooler side of comfort by afternoon, with a soft southwest breeze providing a gentle reminder of the maritime influence that often whispers along the coastline.

While the day's clarity remains shrouded, one might find pockets of fog hanging delicately along the backdrop of the Bay, particularly close to the Golden Gate, weaving its enigmatic allure through the landscape. This sense of mystery may even charm the soul as one ventures out. For those navigating the streets today, layers will serve as steadfast companions: a light jacket over a long sleeve or comfortable sweater, wrapping around one with a cozy embrace against the coolness that accompanies the marine layer. As the day unfolds, consider casting your gaze towards the gardens or parks that breathe life into the city. A walk along the waterfront or a visit to one of the quieter corners will unveil the nuanced beauty of a city gently waking from its nocturnal slumber, revealing the rhythms of life beneath the clouds.
